ObjTextEntries.textEntry: Oil on canvas attached to wall

Two men in caps, front foreground, shucking corn and placing corn into basket; female tennis player behind man at right; to her left, man holding basketball; to his left, man in baseball uniform, with catcher's mit held above his head; to his left, coach with back to viewer addressing 5 helmeted football players; behind them, three trombone players; next to them, woman and behind her, man with what appears to be scale; next to him, woman and nurse with baby; next to them, three children sitting at table, one child standing.  Railing and steps at right picture plane.  Above painting in lunette is carved dove.

This mural was executed under the auspices of the Works Progress Administration's Federal Art Project.  The murals were specifically created for the Clare Middle School.
